### Removed
- Clean up old and deprecated telemetry collectors:
  - `promtail`
  - `grafana-agent`
  - `promtheus-agent`
- Disable PodSecurityPolicies by default as PodSecurityPolicies are deprecated and removed in Kubernetes v1.25+ clusters
